title: How to Make Manga Comic Books

steps.headline: Create your characters.
steps.description: To design a good character, draw a basic figure and add a unique hairstyle, plus one prominent, unusual feature that will set them apart from other characters, such as a pointy nose or a scar. Also, create an outfit that matches their personality. For example, a mysterious person might wear all black.

steps.headline: Think of a plot.
steps.description: Manga is meant to be like a story with a problem and solution, unlike superhero comics which pretty much has no end. You should create a plot that is interesting and funny at the same time.

steps.headline: Begin drawing your manga.
steps.description: Use only grayscale colors. Manga is meant to be read from right to left and starting at the back of the book.

steps.headline: Once you are finished, make copies and give them to friends.
steps.description: Tweak your manga until you get good reactions.

tyn: Gray and black markers (Prismacolor is an excellent brand.)
